author: Postmedia Network
title: Best hotels for movie lovers | Toronto Sun
text:
Even when traveling, sometimes there's nothing better than sitting down with a glass of win, a cozy blanket, and a good film.
For those cinephiles who want to unwind with a new film they haven't seen before or an old favourite, Bookings.com put together some of the best hotels around the world that offer the most serene and extravagant movie watching experiences.
